name: rumble-library
description: A library for fighting game moves and techniques

scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p public/js public/api public/assets/clips public/data && cp data/moves.json public/data/
scripts.build: cp index.html discord-callback.html public/ && cp -r js/* public/js/ && cp -r api/* public/api/ && cp -r assets/* public/assets/ && cp -r data/* public/data/
